nodes.bodyText: DartRelativePathsConsoleFilter is intended to be used in test environs. Are you sure deleting it is the right thing to do?
No, I'll add it back in, and add some brief docs about what the different filters do.
I think you want DartConsoleFilter here, too, but it may be getting added at a later stage. I forgot just how convoluted this is.
We may just need the DartConsoleFilter in the SdkRunConfig.java (the run/debug console)? If you're certain I can add it, but would otherwise hold off.
Are you sure you want to remove this? It has some specialized logic for handling Flutter stuff, like plugins.

I'll figure out what all the FlutterConsoleFilter is responsible for. I think it's more important for the run console (to link to lib.main.dart, and some flutter doctor output?). It may have several different concerns in that class.
I added docs to FlutterConsoleFilter. I think we only want to use it for the run and debug consoles.
